about_the_game:
The DLC adds new Boss levels and beautiful CG
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Shooting girls is a leisure and decompression shooting game.
The difficulty increases with the level.
An evil force has occupied your country and kidnapped the girls. You were chosen as a soldier to save these girls
You can get gold coins every time you shoot
Unlock weapons and upgrade with gold coins
You need to use different weapons and move positions to unlock more levels and girls' CG
there are more interesting mini-games, flop turntable and so on.
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
The content of the current version is limited. Thank you for your support
More content will be updated later

content_descriptors.notes:
This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Sexual Content, General Mature Content
All characters involved in sexual content are over the age of 18.

name: shootinggirlDLC

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: I5
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 970 GTX or AMD Radeon R9 290x Card or Higher
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: I5
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 970 GTX or AMD Radeon R9 290x Card or Higher
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

short_description: It's a casual stress-busting shooter game where you beat enemies to get gold for upgrades and unlock weapons and the more levels it is, you have to think about how do you complete the game by refine Weapons . Also there alot fun things like turntable flip cards and other mini-games and CG in here.
supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese*
*languages with full audio support
